about_the_game:
This is a collection of all the old and new sounds from the Demon Gaze Extra game, ranging from the classic Demon Gaze background music to new songs, for a total of 49 tracks.

[White Charm]
01 [Overture]
02 [Strange shadow]
03 [MoonLightRequiem (Silent Ver.)]
04 [Departure]
05 [Daily Life]
06 [Dragon's inn act1]
07 [Bounty hunter]

09 [Memory]
10 [Story of Dragon's inn]
11 [She looks happy.]
12 [Eyes on Flan]
13 [The finale]
[Black Charm]
14 [Natural born dolls]

16 [Mithrid hunter]
17 [G･A･Z･E･R melody]

28 [Clockwork trap]
29 [Cross GAZER]
30 [Eden of the monarch]
31 [The Dark SOL]
[Star Charm]
